messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Please do not uwu on my ship. uwuing will result in death

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Emergency Storage.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to Huggy Wuggy Snuggy Wuggy. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

All SMESs on Huggy Wuggy Snuggy Wuggy have been recharged. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Huggy Wuggy Snuggy Wuggy door subroutines. Severity level of 1. Recommend station AI involvement.
